abstract: Time Warner Cable and Cablevision have reached deals with HBO to offer its online streaming service, HBO Go, to their customers.
snippet: Time Warner Cable and Cablevision have reached deals with HBO to offer its online streaming service, HBO Go, to their customers.
lead_paragraph: 6:53 p.m. | Updated More than a year after HBO began introducing its online streaming service HBO Go, the two cable holdouts, Time Warner Cable and Cablevision, are about to turn it on for their customers.

headline.main: Cablevision and Time Warner to Offer ‘HBO Go’
